summary: MY AIR BAG LIGHT CAME ON AND WARNING BEEPS CONSECUTIVELY 5 TIMES THEN STOPS AND REPEATS WITH 5 BEEPS.   AFTER CHECKING THE MANUAL I WENT ONLINE AND FOUND OUT THERE ARE SEVERAL COMPLAINTS REGARDING THIS MAKE AND MODEL HAVING THE SAME PROLEM.   WHY IS THERE SO RECALL????    ALSO WOULD SEEM TO BE A HAZARD REGARDING NO AIRBAG DEPLOY AND VERY EXPENSIVE TO FIX.
